title: Opinion: I’m a CVS pharmacist. My retail pharmacy colleagues and I face a crisis
description: “There is often less than a minute to review an order before falling behind,” and that makes it harder to catch potential problems, a pharmacist warns.
content: “There is often less than a minute to review an order before falling behind,” and that makes it harder to catch potential problems, a pharmacist warns.
